statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace of \mathcal{P}^3 W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{-2 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 8 \, x - 6 , -6 \, x^{3} + x^{2} - 3 \, x + 4 , x^{3} - x^{2} - 4 \, x + 3 , 8 \, x^{3} + 2 \, x^{2} + 22 \, x - 20 , -4 \, x^{3} - x^{2} - 11 \, x + 10\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
